tweets.text:
It‚Äôs not all about building new #flood defences, a lot of work goes on to maintain the ones we already have. 

Today we have steel sheet piling being hammered in at #Torksey #Lincolnshire to strengthen the flood embankment. https://t.co/WwAHWFYg2o

Great to start the day with news of a brilliant upgrade by at Bessom Bridge gauging station. Repairs to fencing and undermining of wall all delivered by our very own @EnvAgency @DCfieldteamsEA 

Top job and great to see the first job of 21-22 done, thanks so much! https://t.co/0KXVhnb1f8

@calum @EnvAgency We are working with the National Trust to minimise the effects of the spillage. Our officers are onsite to gauge the extent and working to contain the diesel and its harmful effects.

This #EarthDay we celebrate #TeamEA and people around the world tackling the #ClimateCrisis and creating a better place. 

It‚Äôs also a time to face up to the challenge ahead. Global heating is not science fiction, it‚Äôs wreaking havoc with people‚Äôs lives from England to Egypt.

tweets.text:
This #EarthDay let‚Äôs commit to creating a planet which is blue and green, not grey and brown. 

Let‚Äôs act decisively to mitigate and adapt to the existential threat of climate change. 

This is our chance. Let‚Äôs make our planet a place where we don‚Äôt just survive, but thrive.

tweets.text:
Work will start this month to repair a heavily eroded river bank on the River South Tyne in Haydon Bridge, Northumberland. 

The work involves strengthening the river bank below the riverside footpath and  replanting with trees to further stabilise it. 

https://t.co/PRbHgzgdSa
